fetters.name: possessive
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
2: Possessive
Desc: You want to possess her. To make her your own and not let anyone have her. One could call it love, but it's more wicked than that.
Effect: At the beginning and end of combat, choose a Part of the target's to deal 1 damage to.

fetters.name: dependent
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
3: Dependent
Desc: The target is someone you just can't live without. If they aren't there, you are nothing.
Effect: Your Maximum Action Points decrease by 2.

fetters.name: attached
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
4: Attached
Desc: You want to stay by her side. To always be wherever she is. You'll never, never be apart.
Effect: At the beginning and end of combat, the target receives a Madness Point upon her Fetter towards you (if she is already in a Broken state, this has no effect.)

fetters.name: devoted
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
5: Devoted
Desc: You're in love with the target so much it hurts. You don't want her to hate you. You can't take your eyes off her. It's embarrassing...
Effect: At the beginning and end of combat, damage one of your own Parts.

fetters.name: rival
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
6: Rival
Desc: You won't lose to her. It's not that you hate her. You just don't want to lose to her. You're rivals.
Effect: At the beginning and end of combat, receive a Madness Point upon a Fetter of your choice (if you are already in a Broken state, this has no effect.)

fetters.name: friendly
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
7: Friendly
Desc: She's a friend and an important companion. As her dear friend, there's nothing you wouldn't do for her.
Effect: At the end of a Session, if the target of the Fetter has more damaged Parts than you do, take damage to Parts of your choice until you have the same number of damaged Parts.

fetters.name: protective
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
8: Protective
Desc: That girl's weak. She needs you to protect her. To help her. She can't do anything on her own.
Effect: During combat, if you are in a different area from the target of the Fetter, you may not use Maneuvers that have an effect other than Movement. In addition, you may not use Movement Maneuvers upon targets other than yourself or the target of the Fetter.

fetters.name: idolatrous
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
9: Idolatrous
Desc: You want to be just like her. She's everything that you long to be... that you wish you could be.
Effect: During combat, if you are in the same area from the target of the Fetter, you may not use Maneuvers that have an effect other than Movement. In addition, you may not use Movement Maneuvers upon targets other than yourself or the target of the Fetter.

fetters.name: trusting
fetters.text:
Category: Fetters
10: Trusting
Desc: Your heart is as one with her. You can trust her with everything. Whenever she's by your side, you can feel at ease.
Effect: All of your Sisters other than you receive a modifier of -1 to their Maximum Action Points.

fetters.name: fetters
fetters.text:
Fetters are those existences which a Doll clings to in order to preserve her Heart. By maintaning her feelings towards the target of her Fetters, a Doll likewise maintains her Heart. However, if she loses all of her Fetters, she shall lose her Heart as well. In addition, if the burden upon them becomes too heavy, her Heart will break.
1: Hateful
2: Possessive
3: Dependent
4: Attached
5: Devoted
6: Rival
7: Friendly
8: Protective
9: Idolatrous
10: Trusting

savant_fetters.name: fearful
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
1: Fearful
Desc: You don't want to remember her. You don't want to think of her. To you, she is a font of despair.
Effect: All Action and Madness Checks you make receive a modifier of -1.

savant_fetters.name: subservient
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
2: Subservient
Desc: Your obedience to her is engraved deep into your heart. At times, it still torments you with indecision.
Effect: During the Battle Phase, all of your failures on Attack Checks become Critical Failures.

savant_fetters.name: unease
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
3: Unease
Desc: You've felt uneasy about that person from the start. As if she might have some terrifying secret. That's why...
Effect: Your Maximum Action Points decrease by 2.

savant_fetters.name: pity
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
4: Pity
Desc: You don't want to understand her, but you do. You know you should hate her, but you don't. You just feel sorry for her.
Effect: You receive a modifier of -1 to Attack Checks against Savants.

savant_fetters.name: love-hate
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
5: Love-Hate
Desc: She's an enemy that you should hate, but you can't hate her. How could you ever not realize there's good things about her too?
Effect: For each Critical Success you roll on an Action Check or Madness Check, do (the result of the check - 10) Damage to your own Parts of your choice.

savant_fetters.name: regret
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
6: Regret
Desc: It's because of you that she's become like this. You can't help but regret that.
Effect: When you roll a failure on an Attack Check, do the damage of the attack to a Location of your choice.

savant_fetters.name: disdain
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
7: Disdain
Desc: Just what value does she have? You'd never associate with the likes of her by choice.
Effect: Enemies in the same Area as you gain a modifier of +1 to Attack Checks made against you.

savant_fetters.name: anger
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
8: Anger
Desc: Your heart is like a maelstrom of rage towards her. You can't think of anything but destroying her.
Effect: All Action and Madness Checks you make receive a modifier of -1.

savant_fetters.name: grudge
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
9: Grudge
Desc: You'll never forgive her. You'll never forget her. Even if you become junk, you'll crawl back for her.
Effect: You cannot escape from Battle. You must pay an additional AP to use Maneuvers on any target other than yourself or the target of this Fetter.

savant_fetters.name: hatred
savant_fetters.text:
Category: Savant Fetters
10: Hatred
Desc: Hatred as cold as steel pierces the very core of your being. As long as she exists in this world, you will continue to embrace it.
Effect: When this Fetter enters a state of Madness, choose one of your Sisters and destroy two of their Parts.

savant_fetters.name: savant fetters
savant_fetters.text:
Fetters are those existences which a Doll clings to in order to preserve her Heart. By maintaning her feelings towards the target of her Fetters, a Doll likewise maintains her Heart. However, if she loses all of her Fetters, she shall lose her Heart as well. In addition, if the burden upon them becomes too heavy, her Heart will break.
1: Fearful
2: Subservient
3: Unease
4: Pity
5: Love-Hate
6: Regret
7: Disdain
8: Anger
9: Grudge
10: Hatred

neutral_fetters.name: evasive
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
1: Evasive
Desc: She disgusts you. You don't want to touch her. You don't want to be near her. You can't even look at her.
Effect: During combat, when you are in the same Area as the target of this Fetter or a Savant, you may not use Maneuvers that have an effect other than Movement. In addition, you may not use Movement Maneuvers upon targets other than yourself or the triggers of this effect.

neutral_fetters.name: subservient
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
2: Jealous
Desc: This body of yours is in such an awful state, so why is hers... why is hers?...
Effect: All of your Sisters receive a modifier of -1 to Action Checks.

neutral_fetters.name: unease
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
3: Dependent
Desc: You can't imagine herself without her. You can't be apart. You don't want to be apart. Never ever...
Effect: Your Maximum Action Points decrease by 2.

neutral_fetters.name: pity
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
4: Pity
Desc: Why is it that she's the only one who had to go through that suffering? Did she do anything to deserve it?
Effect: You receive a modifier of -1 to Attack Checks against Savants.

neutral_fetters.name: love-hate
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
5: Grateful
Desc: You're simply grateful to her. It's thanks to her that your body and mind are here right now... even if it's not much of a body.
Effect: When this Fetter enters a state of Madness, destroy two of your Basic Parts. If none remain, destroy one of your lowest level Reinforcement Parts.

neutral_fetters.name: regret
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
6: Regret
Desc: That she's become like this is your own fault. Even now, that truth pierces through your heart like a thorn.
Effect: When you roll a failure on an Attack Check, do the damage of the attack to a Location of your choice.

neutral_fetters.name: disdain
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
7: Faith
Desc: You're certain she can do anything for you. That knowledge gives you hope. She can. There's no doubt about it. She can.
Effect: Whenever you use a Madness Point to reroll a die, you receive a penalty of -1 to that die roll. (This penalty is cumulative.)

neutral_fetters.name: anger
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
8: Guardian
Desc: It's not just because she's your Sister that you must protect her. There's something more than that...
Effect: You cannot target Legions with Maneuvers.

neutral_fetters.name: grudge
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
9: Reverent
Desc: You're different from her, that's for certain. But that's why you can recognize how amazing she is.
Effect: You cannot target your other Sisters with Maneuvers.

neutral_fetters.name: hatred
neutral_fetters.text:
Category: Neutral Fetters
10: Trusting
Desc: From the bottom of your heart, you can trust her. In this ruined world, she's the only person you can believe in.
Effect: All of your Sisters other than you receive a modifier of -1 to their Maximum Action Points.

neutral_fetters.name: neutral fetters
neutral_fetters.text:
Fetters are those existences which a Doll clings to in order to preserve her Heart. By maintaning her feelings towards the target of her Fetters, a Doll likewise maintains her Heart. However, if she loses all of her Fetters, she shall lose her Heart as well. In addition, if the burden upon them becomes too heavy, her Heart will break.
1: Evasive
2: Jealous
3: Dependent
4: Pity
5: Grateful
6: Regret
7: Faith
8: Guardian
9: Reverent
10: Trusting

treasure.name: treasures
treasure.text:
They each possess a single trinket as girls would. These are precious belongings where the Hearts of the Dolls are kept, and are known as Treasures.
1: Photograph
2: Book
3: Undead Pet
4: Broken Part
5: Mirror
6: Doll
7: Stuffed Animal
8: Accessory
9: Basket
10: Cute Clothes

timing.name: auto
timing.text:
Category: Timing
Auto: Takes effect simultaneously with the declaration of its use. Automatically successful if the conditions for use are satisfied. Generally, these Maneuvers have no Cost, and are usable during the Adventure Phase and End Phase as well.

timing.name: action
timing.text:
Category: Timing
Action: Usable during the Battle Phase when the Count matches your Action Points. Can be used any number of times during a Round.

timing.name: check
timing.text:
Category: Timing
Check: Usable during the Battle Phase when anyone within range makes a Check (after they roll the dice.) Generally each Maneuver of this type is usable only once per Round.

timing.name: damage
timing.text:
Category: Timing
Damage: Usable during the Battle Phase whenever a target on the Field of Battle takes damage. Generally each Maneuver of this type is usable only once per Round.

timing.name: rapid
timing.text:
Category: Timing
Rapid: Usable during the Battle Phase whenever anyone declares a Maneuver with the "Action" or "Rapid" Timing. Maneuvers with this Timing occur before the Maneuvers they were declared in reaction to and override their result. One cannot decide to use them after a Maneuver has already taken effect. May also be used as an Action itself when the Count matches your Action Points. Unless otherwise stated, each Maneuver of this type is usable only once per Round.

timing.name: timing
timing.text:
Auto: Takes effect simultaneously with the declaration of its use. Automatically successful if the conditions for use are satisfied. Generally, these Maneuvers have no Cost, and are usable during the Adventure Phase and End Phase as well.
Action: Usable during the Battle Phase when the Count matches your Action Points. Can be used any number of times during a Round.
Check: Usable during the Battle Phase when anyone within range makes a Check (after they roll the dice.) Generally each Maneuver of this type is usable only once per Round.
Damage: Usable during the Battle Phase whenever a target on the Field of Battle takes damage. Generally each Maneuver of this type is usable only once per Round.
Rapid: Usable during the Battle Phase whenever anyone declares a Maneuver with the "Action" or "Rapid" Timing. Maneuvers with this Timing occur before the Maneuvers they were declared in reaction to and override their result. One cannot decide to use them after a Maneuver has already taken effect. May also be used as an Action itself when the Count matches your Action Points. Unless otherwise stated, each Maneuver of this type is usable only once per Round.

premonition.name: premonitions
premonition.text:
As game sessions take place, the Dolls will reacquire their lost memories. But they can carry only a vague suspicion of what these memories will reveal to them. These "Premonitions" serve as a guide towards their former lives.
1: Catastrophe
2: Despair
3: Trapped
4: Doll
5: Sinner
6: Loss
7: Seeker
8: Inversion
9: Hope
10: Happiness

fragments.name: the view from the window
fragments.text:
Category: Fragments
60: The View from the Window

fragments.name: a visit from death
fragments.text:
Category: Fragments
95: A Visit from Death

fragments.name: the world after death
fragments.text:
Category: Fragments
97: The World After Death

fragments.name: fragments
fragments.text:
Though Dolls have lost most of their memories of their previous life, they have not lost them all. Just a few memories of their previous life remain. These meager scraps are thus known as "Fragments of Memory."
1: Blue Sky
2: Mother's Hands
3: Sweet Lips
4: Hidden Room
5: Bloodbath
6: In the Rain
7: Loneliness
8: Smile
9: Letter
10: Silhoutte
11: Flower Garden
12: Father's Arms
13: Blossoming Love
14: Curse
15: Song
16: Cake
17: Flames
18: Cut
19: White Room
20: Black House
21: Chains
22: Starry Sky
23: Girl
24: Treasure
25: Funeral Service
26: Party
27: New Life
28: Pet Dog
29: Wings
30: Everyday Life
31: Thrown Away
32: Apology
33: Monetary Greed
34: Death
35: Birthplace
36: Wish
37: Water
38: Knitting
39: Gratitude
40: Fragrance of Soil
41: God
42: Classroom
43: Futon
44: Dresser
45: Operating Table
46: Stalker
47: Envy
48: Hikikomori
49: Shower
50: Gunshot
51: Library
52: Mask
53: All Alone
54: Musical Performance
55: Snow
56: Sports
57: Twin
58: Caged Bird
59: Doll
60: The View from the Window
61: Fortune-Telling
62: Holding Hands
63: Starvation
64: Humiliation
65: Cute Clothes
66: Cooking
67: Bully
68: Painting
69: Lust
70: The Living Dead
71: Dozing
72: Conversation
73: The Dead Rise
74: Game
75: Sold
76: Study
77: Happy Times
78: Burial
79: Shopping
80: Amusement Park
81: Tea Party
82: Secret
83: Flowerbed
84: Ghost
85: Refuge
86: Separation
87: Story
88: Big Brother
89: Lost Child
90: Beach
91: War
92: Handling a Corpse
93: Medicine

96: Lie
97: The World After Death
